posts.post_content:
Available for sale are the following cards:

John Ganzel (Piedmont) - $35
Danny Hoffman (Piedmont) - SOLD
Rube Oldring (Sweet Caporal) - SOLD
Bill Clymer (Piedmont) - SOLD
Ossee Schreck (Piedmont) - $50
Dave Brain (Piedmont) - $50
Rube Dessau (Piedmont) - SOLD
Ed Konetchy (Sweet Caporal) - SOLD
Simon Nichols (Sweet Caporal) - $55 [PRICE DROP]
Hal Chase (Blue Portrait/Sweet Caporal) - $60 [PRICE DROP]
Frank Smith (White Cap/Sweet Caporal) - $85 [PRICE DROP 12.21.23]
Joe Tinker (Bat on Shoulder/Sweet Caporal) - SOLD

Please add $5 for Shipping and Handling.

If you want to purchase any of these cards:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.

I'll take Howell, Leach, Lake, Willett, and Blackburne if all still available.

Email to follow.
I’ll take Larry Doyle if available; thanks.
I’ll take Dessau and Konetchy.  Sending email
